record.id: field.name="end.of.day.window" and file.name="slocatalog" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: end.of.day.window
record.file.name: slocatalog

brief.brief: The amount of time before the actual end of day (determined by the schedule specified for the SLT) that will not count as part of that day.

detail.detail: For example, if the end of day based on the SLT's schedule is 5 pm, and the end of day window is 2 hours, an Interaction that is registered before 3 pm will be handled as part of that day, but any Interactions registered after 3 pm will be counted as part of the following day's 'end of day' time.
If no end of day window is set, the 'end of day' time is based on the actual 'end of day' time specified in the SLT's schedule.
